let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let max = ref 0

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException

let explode s =

  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in

     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in

    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

    | [] -> 0

  | [] -> ""
  | h :: t -> 
      let f a x = a ^ sep ^ x in
      let base = h in

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

let _ = print130 ("Compiled"^key^"\n")

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

exception TestException

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

let _ = runAllTests ()

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException

  let testGood x = 1 in

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" &&

let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =

      | Fail -> "[fail]"

let runAllTests () =
  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
  let s = Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([s])) in
    (!score,!max)

      l1, List.append (clone 0 (first - sec)) l2
    else 
      l1, l2

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)^"\n"); ErrorCode "exception") 

exception TestException
let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"


let runTest (f,arg,out,points,name) =
  let _ = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let wrap_curried_2 f (a,b) = f a b

  let _ = (score := 0; max := 0) in
  let report = 
    [runTest (sqsum, [], 0, 1, "sqsum 1");
     runTest (sqsum, [1;2;3;4], 30, 1, "sqsum 2");
     runTest (sqsum, [-1;-2;-3;-4], 30, 1, "sqsum 3");

     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([], 3), 3, 1, "pipe 1");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x-> 2*x);(fun x -> x + 3)], 3), 9, 1, "pipe 2");
     runTest (wrap_curried_2 pipe, ([(fun x -> x + 3); (fun x-> 2*x)], 3), 12, 1, "pipe 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, (", ",["foo";"bar";"baz"]), "foo, bar, baz", 1, "sepConcat 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("---",[]), "", 1, "sepConcat 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("",["a";"b";"c";"d";"e"]), "abcde", 1, "sepConcat 3");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 sepConcat, ("X",["hello"]), "hello", 1, "sepConcat 4");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, (string_of_int,[1;2;3;4;5;6]), "[1; 2; 3; 4; 5; 6]",1,"stringOfList 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((fun x -> x),["foo"]), "[foo]",1,"stringOfList 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 stringOfList, ((stringOfList string_of_int),[[1;2;3];[4;5];[6];[]]), "[[1; 2; 3]; [4; 5]; [6]; []]",1,"stringOfList 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (3,5), [3;3;3;3;3],1,"clone 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, ("foo",2), ["foo";"foo"],1,"clone 2");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 clone, (clone,-3), [],1,"clone 3");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), ([0;0;9;9],[1;0;0;2]),1,"padzero 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 padZero, ([1;0;0;2],[9;9]), ([1;0;0;2],[0;0;9;9]),1,"padzero 2");

     runTest(removeZero, [0;0;0;1;0;0;2], [1;0;0;2],1,"removeZero 1");
     runTest(removeZero, [9;9], [9;9],1,"removeZero 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9],[1;0;0;2]), [1;1;0;1],1, "bigAdd 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigAdd,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9]), [1;0;9;9;8],1, "bigAdd 2");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 mulByDigit,  (9,[9;9;9;9]), [8;9;9;9;1],1, "mulByDigit 1");

     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;8;0;0;0;1],1, "bigMul 1");
     runTest(wrap_curried_2 bigMul,  ([9;9;9;9;9],[9;9;9;9;9]), [9;9;9;9;8;0;0;0;0;1],1,"bigMul 2");
    ] in
